title: How to Make Individual Lemon Meringues

steps.headline: Line a baking sheet with brown paper.
Put egg whites, cream of tartar & salt in a large bowl and beat until foamy.
Add sugar gradually, beating until meringue is stiff and holds its shape.
With a rubber scraper and a spoon, shape meringue into eight 3-inch rings with sides about 1-1/2 inches high on prepared baking sheets.
Bake 45 to 50 minutes until lightly brown.
Prepare lemon-yoghurt filling while meringues are baking.
steps.description: Put yoghurt & lemon pudding mix in a large bowl, beat with electric mixer on low speed about 2 minutes until well blended. Refrigerate 30 minutes.

steps.headline: After the meringues are baked, cool for 5 minutes on baking sheets.
Remove the paper.
steps.description: Cool thoroughly on a wire rack.

steps.headline: Fill each meringue ring with lemon-yogurt filing.

text: Preheat oven to 275 deg F.  Line a baking sheet with brown paper.  Put egg whites, cream of tartar & salt in a large bowl and beat until foamy.  Add sugar gradually, beating until meringue is stiff and holds its shape. Beat in vanilla extract. With a rubber scraper and a spoon, shape meringue into eight 3-inch rings with sides about 1-1/2 inches high on prepared baking sheets.  Bake 45 to 50 minutes until lightly brown.  Prepare lemon-yoghurt filling while meringues are baking. Put yoghurt & lemon pudding mix in a large bowl, beat with electric mixer on low speed about 2 minutes until well blended. Refrigerate 30 minutes. After the meringues are baked, cool for 5 minutes on baking sheets.  Remove the paper. Cool thoroughly on a wire rack. Fill each meringue ring with lemon-yogurt filing.  Makes 8 servings.
